metadataAttributes.title: C1.2 The entity disposes of confidential information to meet the entityâ€™s objectives related to confidentiality
metadataAttributes.summary: Identifies Confidential Information for Destruction - Procedures are in place to identify confidential information requiring destruction when the end of the retention period is reached. Destroys Confidential Information - Procedures are in place to erase or otherwise destroy confidential information that has been identified for destruction.
